summary: This is a Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General form requesting transcription of three audio interviews recorded on August 12, 2019, related to case number 2019010614. The form includes approval signatures and cost estimates for the transcription service.

persons.name: Dick-Shannon, Charlotte
persons.context: Appears as an approver of the transcription request, signing off on the form on September 23, 2019.

events.title: Audio Interviews Conducted
events.description: Three separate audio interviews were recorded on this date, with lengths of 2 hours 55 minutes, 1 hour 28 minutes 3 seconds, and 6 minutes 57 seconds.

events.title: Transcription Request Submitted
events.description: A request form was submitted to the DOJ OIG Investigations Division to transcribe audio interviews from August 12, 2019.

events.title: Transcription Request Approved
events.description: Charlotte Dick-Shannon approved the transcription request for the audio interviews.

keyFacts: The document is a DOJ OIG transcription request form for case number 2019010614.
Three audio interviews totaling approximately 108 minutes were recorded on August 12, 2019, and requested for transcription.
The estimated cost for transcription was $468.18.
Charlotte Dick-Shannon approved the request on September 23, 2019.
The form references 'Epstein' and terms like 'SHU' and 'MCC' in the 'Names and Unfamiliar Terms' section.
